pr_title: Introduce built-in number operations in Qute extension

timeline.bodyText: Map is not a collection so we should probably extract the relevant methods in MapTemplateExtensions.
timeline.author: mkouba

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should use a more generic name, ie. NumberTemplateExtensions?
timeline.author: mkouba

timeline.message:
Introduce built-in number operations in Qute extension

Fixes #7283
